home.title: My Projects
home.text: These projects are solely personal projects done in my spare time; they are in no way college or school projects.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I am Lilian Marchebout, a Master 1 Computer Science student, specializing in Software Design at the University of Poitiers. Since high school, I have developed a passion for computer science, which led me to specialize in backend development.
about.goal: My professional goal is to work in the research sector, where I could use computer science to solve complex problems in fields such as computational biology, physical simulations, or other scientific applications.
about.interest: I am particularly interested in using computer science to model and analyze complex scientific phenomena, emphasizing system efficiency and result accuracy. My ambition is to join a research project where computer science plays a key role in scientific innovation.
about.linkedin: You can check my LinkedIn profile for more information about my background and skills.
